full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SHIS BRJOD GA-YAS 'KHYIL DUNG GI RANG SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SMON LAM THEG MCHOG LAM GYI BZHON PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SHIS BRJOD GA-YAS 'KHYIL DUNG GI RANG SGRA ZHES BYA BA NI,
